meanings.definition: Having or capable of having many values or meanings.
meanings.sent1: The multivalents puzzle had so many possible solutions.
meanings.sent2: Her multivalents artwork could be interpreted in various ways.
meanings.sent3: The multivalents story confused the children with its multiple endings.
meanings.sent4: His multivalents personality made it hard to predict his reactions.
meanings.sent5: The multivalents nature of the word made it challenging to translate accurately.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound that can combine with two or more atoms or groups.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the multivalents to understand its reactivity.
meanings.sent2: The multivalents in the experiment formed a stable bond with the elements.
meanings.sent3: The multivalents in the lab were mischievously mixing with other compounds.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like multivalents, attracting different perspectives and reactions.
meanings.sent5: The multivalents in the solution created a colorful and dynamic reaction.
